text: The Snow Maiden () is a 1968 Soviet fantasy movie directed by Pavel Kadochnikov.Пожирнее и погуще. Как в Москве будут Масленицу отмечатьСнегурочка It stars Yevgenia Filonova, Evgeny Zharikov, and Irina Gubanova. == Actors == * Yevgenia Filonova as Snegurochka * Evgeny Zharikov as Lel * Irina Gubanova as Kupava * Boris Khimichev as Misghir * Pavel Kadochnikov as Tsar Berendey * Natalya Klimova as Vesna * Valeri Malyshev as Brusilo == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1968 fantasy movies Category:Soviet fantasy movies Category:Movies set in palaces
title: The Snow Maiden (1968 movie)
